name: Timeline Reading
description: Four-card timeline showing development over different time periods

positions.label: Past Month
positions.description: Events and energies from the past month

instructions: Focus on a particular area of your life or goal
Draw the first card for past month's influences
Draw the second card for this week's energy
Draw the third card for next month's outlook
Draw the fourth card for long-term direction
Look for the progression and evolution across time

interpretation.overview: The Timeline Reading shows how energy and circumstances evolve over time, helping you plan and prepare for what's ahead.
tips: Notice the progression from past to future
Look for repeating themes or numbers across cards
Pay attention to how past energies influence the future
The Present Week card often holds the key to everything
Use this spread for major life decisions or transitions
